source.62f8060b:
pollutant = list(air_quality['Pollutants'].unique())
for poll in pollutant:
    plt.figure(figsize=(18,8), dpi = 100)
    sns.countplot(air_quality[air_quality['Pollutants'] == poll]['State'], data = air_quality)
    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.title(poll)
